arts.ttl: Southend maintain momentum with home win over struggling Fylde
arts.sum: A goal in each half saw off the visitors at Roots Hall.

arts.ttl: Tom Hopper leaves Colchester United and joins Essex neighbours Southend United
arts.sum: "There’s a chance now to try and carry on where I left off and play a part in the upward trajectory of the club, having been here as it was going through a bit of a struggle.” Hopper scored three goals in all competitions in his second season at Southend before leaving to join Lincoln City for an undisclosed fee in January, 2020.
